page.title: 06Bird Watching
page.content:
{A Special Day
Early on a Saturday Morning I get up, put some old dull clothes on, pull on a balaclava, put my{fieldglasses}round my neck, pick up a pad and pencil and set off down to the beach.
The fishing boats are just going out and the{gulls}are foraging through the seaweed that has been washed up in the night. I write a list of the birds I see and sometimes sketch them. Besides seeing gulls and{cormorants, pigeons, {crows}and{terns}come into view aswell.
I spend about 1\ hours bird watching and then go home. I look through my list and enter my notes into my Field Study Book.
